otherNames: Urban Strongest Landlord, The Most Powerful Landlord in the City, 都市最强房东动态漫画, Working hard to rent a house, 都市最强房东
synopsis: A mysterious expert retires to the city, taking up the profession of a landlord. Seemingly a lazy and laid-back style of renting, but in reality, there are countless adventures. Under the lively and noisy eaves, from enemies to friends, or from friendship to love, they undergo various twists and turns, experiencing setbacks and growth. Witness how they persist in friendship, redeem in love, and break free in family ties.
